posts.text:

posts.text:
Another point…. We don’t even have any major institutions with large weightings yet.  We don’t have any main stream broker research.  

We are so damn early.  When the contracts are announced and the brokers on Bay Street and Wall Street start putting in writing what Grok and other Ai engines calculate… the price target will be nuts.   The mainstream ramp up will be insanely exciting.   Seen this movie a few times… 

That why I think it’s gonna be $20-30 this summer.
posts.author: BambroughKevin
